pageProps.headTitle: A Griffiths - Web Developer, Software Engineer - Contact me
pageProps.metaDescription: Andrew Griffiths, web developer and software engineer in kent, UK. Personal website all about me. Get in touch, contact me here.
pageProps.contentHeading: Would you like my help or just want to chat about something? Maybe a project you would like me for?

socialMedia.copy: It would be fantastic to hear from you! Could you catch me at one of these places please?
